#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int p=0;
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int n=s.length();
        for(int i=0; i<n/2; i++)
        {
            if(s[i]!=s[n-i-1])
                p=1;
        }
        if(p)
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
